name: VeriPark
tagline: Experience, expertise and speed to market
description:
VeriPark is a software house specialized in providing multichannel delivery, customer relationship management and loan origination solutions to financial institutions.
We have expertise on a wide range of technologies and platforms including enterprise architectures, .NET, mobile technologies, enterprise integration, SOA and work with agile software development methodologies.
VeriPark is headquartered in Istanbul in one of the most prestigious technology clusters within the campus of Istanbul Technical University. VeriPark has also offices in Dubai and İzmir and our client base range from Istanbul to Dubai and from Moscow to Jordan.
